name: Unfinished Business
description: The ghost must conclude any unfinished business they had during their lifetime. This could be anything from resolving a quarrel to delivering a message.

name: Acceptance
description: The ghost must come to terms with its death and accept it. Denial or fear can keep the spirit tied to the earthly realm.

name: Forgiveness
description: If the ghost died with feelings of resentment or anger, they may need to forgive those who wronged them to move on.

name: Justice
description: In cases where the ghost was murdered or wronged in some way, they might need to see justice served before they can move on.

name: Loved Ones
description: If a ghost is clinging to the world due to concern for loved ones, they might need to ensure their loved ones are safe and happy before moving on.

name: Knowledge of Death
description: Some spirits may not even realize they're dead. The realization and acceptance of their death might be necessary for them to move on.

name: Release of Guilt
description: If the ghost died with feelings of guilt, they might need to come to terms with their actions and forgive themselves.

name: Fear of the Unknown
description: Ghosts might fear what comes after death and cling to the familiar world. Overcoming this fear can allow them to move on.

name: Rituals
description: Some cultures believe certain rituals need to be performed for a ghost to move on, such as a proper burial or specific prayers.

name: Emotional Release
description: A ghost might be holding onto strong emotions like love, anger, or sadness. Letting go of these emotions can allow the ghost to move on.

name: Presence of Loved Ones
description: Sometimes, the presence or voice of a loved one can help a ghost move on.

name: Revelation of Truth
description: If a ghost's death was shrouded in mystery or lies, uncovering the truth might be necessary for them to move on.

name: Understanding
description: The ghost might need to understand why they died, especially if their death was sudden or unexpected.

name: Peaceful Environment
description: A quiet, peaceful environment might be necessary for a ghost to gather their thoughts and move on.

name: Physical Object
description: Sometimes a ghost might be tied to a physical object. Destroying or moving that object could allow the ghost to move on.
